CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 8, 1973, pg. 10, reads: "Tom Thumb Wedding - Tiaras, tuxedos, floor-length gowns, flowers and all the dainty details of the usual wedding ceremony gave an air of authenticity to Tom Thumb Wedding Rites sponsored recently by the Urban League Day Care unit meeting at Homewood YMCA on Bennett St. Standing before Lyle Harris, posing as the parson, Carmel Westen, and Elroy Moore exchanged vows as bride and groom,  Others in picture are Rhonda Smith, flower girl, extreme left: Dorena Leak, maid of honor and Derek Earl, best man, extreme right, Ms. Patricia Johnson, directed the wedding. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Tom Thumb wedding with parson Lyle Harris, flower girl Rhonda Smith, maid of honor Dorena Leak, bride Carmel Westen, groom Elroy Moore, and best man Derek Earl, in Homewood YMCA
